reviews.review: AMAZING!!!!!!!!!!!.THIS IS THAT ONE KINDA FILM IN WHICH U DONT GET UP FROM THE SEAT EVEN AFTER ITS OVER.ECAUSE U DONT WANT IT TO END.........PACKED WITH HUMOR,SUSPENCE,FIGHT SCENES,ANYTHING REQUIRED FOR AN AMZING FILM ITS IN THERE.HOPE TOSEE MORE SUPER HERO FILMS LIKE THGIS

Everything happens so fast that your leaving the theater thinking what the hell just happened. Some bits are kind of confusing, but others are funny and well written. Thanos was easily the Star though. Overall a pretty decent film.

endless battles around thin story line.  evil destroyer using threat of death or pain  to obtain the power of the universe....... sounds like a plot from Transformers.  I have  no interest in seeing the planned sequel
Great movie. My family laughed. Awesome fight scenes.

Terrible. Spends so much time bouncing around between characters that no one gets enough screen time despite it being 3 hours long. Thanos is a weak villain, at best, being far less threatening than even low-tier villains in previous movies. All while oscillating wildly between super tough fighter and weaklings with a toy.
good character moments.  Super bowl of marvel

A live-action cartoon for 6-year-old's, that is essentially a 2.5 hour trailer for the 2019 Avengers movie.  Forget Empire Strikes Back or Dark Knight, this is Marvel's Deathly Hallows:  Part 1...only, it's terrible.

As someone who's gotten pretty fatigued with the Disney MCU movies over the past few years, I have to admit I was impressed with Infinity War. It was full of surprises and averted my expectations at nearly every turn, the antagonist was interesting and engaging, and I felt an emotional connection to the story and characters like I've never felt in any other MCU movie before it. By far the best MCU movie to date in my opinion.
Awesome plot development and villain development..Thanos was hard to develop with the time allotted in this film with the many character arcs but it worked out fine.
